title: Basketball robot sinks human opposition with flawless shots
text:
Basketball robot sinks human opposition with flawless shots 10:07am BST - 01:00 
Toyota engineers create self learning robot that has taught himself how to shoot more accurately than some professional basketball players. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Toyota engineers create self learning robot that has taught himself how to shoot more accurately than some professional basketball players. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2J1DP8i
